name: Lua Station Online
description:
Mine, craft, trade and battle in a brutal world dominated by the all powerful NanoCorp.

MINE

You are given a parcel as a franchisee of the NanoCorp organization which you can use to gather resources and build structures to refine gathered materials into more usable components. Every action you perform on your parcel advances local time on the parcel, bringing benefits and consequences.

CRAFT

Use refined materials to craft structures, combat ships, and objects necessary to survive in this harsh world.

TRADE

Buy and sell goods to enhance your production capabilities and/or to alter your status with one of the rivaling factions.

BATTLE

Your parcel sits inside a battlefield where battles periodically take place, resulting in changes the behavior of your production operations. Protect your parcel from pirates or support your favorite faction to produces boons for everyone online.

This game is in BETA. The full game with updates can be played at luastation.online.
